H0.text: who is dustin johnson the golfer. Athlete

H1.text: who is dustin johnson the golfer. Sportsman

H2.text: who is dustin johnson the golfer. Entrepreneur

H3.text: who is dustin johnson the golfer. Golfer

A4.text: He has won two major championships, the 2016 U.S. Open at Oakmont Country Club with a 4-under-par score of 276 and the 2020 Masters Tournament with a record score of 268, 20-under-par.

A5.text: He has also established a non-profitable organization, Dustin Johnson Foundation, which helps youth learn, play, and contend.

A6.text: He is listed on the PGA Tour official site.

A7.text: He is listed on the Official World Golf Ranking official site.
